result.eng: Tell him to wait for me.

result.orig: abair leis fanacht liom
result.html: abair leis fanacht liomTell him to wait for me.
result.ponchtml: abair leis fanaċt liomTell him to wait for me.

result.eng: Did you meet him?
result.ga: ar chas tú leis
result.orig: ar chas tú leis
result.html: ar chas tú leisDid you meet him?
result.ponchtml: ar ċas tú leisDid you meet him?

result.eng: The children gathered around him.
result.ga: bhailigh na páistí timpeall air

result.html: bhailigh na páistí timpeall airThe children gathered around him.
result.ponchtml: ḃailiġ na páistí timpeall airThe children gathered around him.

result.eng: I met him while I was in Galway.

result.eng: His sons were around him.

result.orig: bhí a mhacra uime
result.html: bhí a mhacra uimeHis sons were around him.

result.eng: They appointed him president.

result.html: cheap siad ina uachtarán éThey appointed him president.
result.ponchtml: ċeap siad ina uaċtarán éThey appointed him president.

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.orig: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.html: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé ceist orm aċ níor ṫug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: She left him after she got her satisfaction from him.

result.orig: d'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as

result.eng: The lads sold him the Mercedes.
result.ga: dhíol na leaids an mercedes dó
result.orig: dhíol na leaids an mercedes dó
result.html: dhíol na leaids an mercedes dóThe lads sold him the Mercedes.
result.ponchtml: ḋíol na leaids an mercedes dóThe lads sold him the Mercedes.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair

result.eng: I told him the price.
result.ga: dúirt mé an praghas leis
result.orig: dúirt mé an praghas leis
result.html: dúirt mé an praghas leisI told him the price.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé an praġas leisI told him the price.

result.eng: I found him lying on the floor.

result.html: fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlárI found him lying on the floor.

result.eng: I begged him for mercy.

result.html: ghuigh mé é um thrócaireI begged him for mercy.
result.ponchtml: ġuiġ mé é um ṫrócaireI begged him for mercy.

result.eng: If you wait a second I'll ask him.
result.ga: má fhanann tú soicind fiafróidh mé de

result.ponchtml: má ḟanann tú soicind fiafróiḋ mé deIf you wait a second I'll ask him.

result.eng: I only know him through the Internet.

result.html: níl agam air ach ríomhaithneI only know him through the Internet.

result.eng: They stood around him.

result.orig: sheas siad ina thimpeall
result.html: sheas siad ina thimpeallThey stood around him.
result.ponchtml: ẛeas siad ina ṫimpeallThey stood around him.

result.eng: They offered him to pay his travel costs.

result.html: thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.

result.eng: His wife left him.
result.ga: thréig a bhean é
result.orig: thréig a bhean é
result.html: thréig a bhean éHis wife left him.
result.ponchtml: ṫréig a ḃean éHis wife left him.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.

result.html: thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.orig: tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air

result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: uime sin dhíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin é

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.orig: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leis

result.eng: Does she help him?

result.orig: an dtugann sí cabhair dó
result.html: an dtugann sí cabhair dóDoes she help him?

result.eng: The insult hurt him deeply.
result.ga: ghoin an masla go smior é
result.orig: ghoin an masla go smior é
result.html: ghoin an masla go smior éThe insult hurt him deeply.
result.ponchtml: ġoin an masla go smior éThe insult hurt him deeply.

result.eng: The smell of the blood revolted him.
result.ga: chuir boladh na fola col air
result.orig: chuir boladh na fola col air
result.html: chuir boladh na fola col airThe smell of the blood revolted him.
result.ponchtml: ċuir bolaḋ na fola col airThe smell of the blood revolted him.

result.eng: They poured the soapy water on top of him.

result.ponchtml: doirteaḋ an t-uisce sobalaċ anuas airThey poured the soapy water on top of him.

result.eng: A bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ga: leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimhe
result.orig: leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimhe
result.html: leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimheA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ponchtml: leagaḋ buidéal uisce beaṫa roiṁeA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.

result.eng: I liked him very much and we never fell out.
result.ga: thaitin sé go mór liom agus níor thiteamar amach le chéile riamh
result.orig: thaitin sé go mór liom agus níor thiteamar amach le chéile riamh

result.ponchtml: ṫaitin sé go mór liom agus níor ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile riaṁI liked him very much and we never fell out.

result.eng: Sleep descended on him in the train.
result.ga: thit a chodladh air sa traein
result.orig: thit a chodladh air sa traein
result.html: thit a chodladh air sa traeinSleep descended on him in the train.
result.ponchtml: ṫit a ċodlaḋ air sa traeinSleep descended on him in the train.

result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ga: tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.orig: tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.html: tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi ba ghránna an mhaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sé aniar aduaiḋ uirṫi ba ġránna an ṁaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.orig: ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.html: ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ponchtml: ba dona an ṁaise dúinn gan a ḃeiṫ buíoċ deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: bhí madraí leis ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: bhí madraí leis ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ga: gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.orig: gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.html: gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ponchtml: ġeall sí dó é – ní ḟéadfaḋ sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.

result.eng: His uncles were teaching mathematics to him.
result.ga: bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dó
result.orig: bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dó
result.html: bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dóHis uncles were teaching mathematics to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dóHis uncles were teaching mathematics to him.

result.eng: He used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.
result.ga: mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadh
result.orig: mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadh

result.ponchtml: ṁaíoḋ sé gurḃ é an féinoideaċas a ċuir ar a ċumas aige smaointe neaṁġnáċa a ċeapaḋHe used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: de bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: de bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: de bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile

result.eng: Upon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ga: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.orig: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de

result.ponchtml: ar a ḋul isteaċ go teaċ na scoile dó d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar ar gaċ taoḃ deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.orig: bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é

result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ċoṁ gann i gcéill leis an leanḃ a ḃí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ga: ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.orig: ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.html: ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ponchtml: aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.html: tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ponchtml: taḃarfaiḋ mé air a ċuid smugaċán díṁúinte a ċoinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.

result.eng: He had a high opinion of him.
result.ga: shíl sé an dúrud de
result.orig: shíl sé an dúrud de
result.html: shíl sé an dúrud deHe had a high opinion of him.
result.ponchtml: ẛíl sé an dúrud deHe had a high opinion of him.

result.eng: It is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ga: ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.orig: ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.html: ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ponchtml: ní cuideaċta ar an doṁan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.

result.eng: You're just like him!
result.ga: tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.orig: tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.html: tá tusa inchurtha leis féinYou're just like him!
result.ponchtml: tá tusa inċurṫa leis féinYou're just like him!

result.eng: He could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ga: ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.orig: ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.html: ní raibh sásamh le déanamh airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ sásaṁ le déanaṁ airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.orig: thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.html: thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ponchtml: ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.orig: tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.html: tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
result.ponchtml: tá muid ina ṁuinín fá ċoinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ponchtml: táṫar á ċur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.

result.eng: I hate him more than the devil.
result.ga: ní lú orm an diabhal ná é
result.orig: ní lú orm an diabhal ná é
result.html: ní lú orm an diabhal ná éI hate him more than the devil.
result.ponchtml: ní lú orm an diaḃal ná éI hate him more than the devil.

result.eng: There was no point in him opposing them.
result.ga: ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.orig: ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.html: ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.

result.eng: They put him in handcuffs.
result.ga: cuireadh glais lámh air
result.orig: cuireadh glais lámh air
result.html: cuireadh glais lámh airThey put him in handcuffs.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ glais láṁ airThey put him in handcuffs.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis

result.ponchtml: ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: He grabbed him by the shoulder.
result.ga: rug sé greim gualann air
result.orig: rug sé greim gualann air
result.html: rug sé greim gualann airHe grabbed him by the shoulder.
result.ponchtml: rug sé greim gualann airHe grabbed him by the shoulder.

result.eng: Pursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ga: a dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.orig: a dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.html: a dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ponchtml: a ḋ'iarraiḋ mná naċ raiḃ toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.eng: I've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ga: níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.orig: níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.html: níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamhI've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ponchtml: níor ċuala mé gadaíoċt curṫa síos dó riaṁI've never heard him being accused of stealing.

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ga: bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.orig: bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.html: bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ponchtml: ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad agam air i mo ċroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do ṁiċeál duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.

result.eng: Babaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
result.ga: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimhe
result.orig: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimhe
result.html: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimheBabaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
result.ponchtml: ḃí lúċáir ṁór ar ḃabaí roiṁeBabaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}

result.eng: Nobody could recognize him.
result.ga: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.orig: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.html: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithneNobody could recognize him.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ dul ag aon duine a aiṫneNobody could recognize him.
